item.description:
Watching soccer at Anna Liffey’s is a great experience, whether you are a die-hard football fan or someone who thinks I just wrote a typo by writing “football” : ) They have great food (surprisingly even great non-pub food – I’ve had good salads there..), and is a wonderful weekend-day hangout. It’s a cozy place to spend a wintry Sunday afternoon, balanced by the energy soccer fans bring whenever they tune into a game.

We also want to give the NHC the chance to say goodbye to one of our gems, Janel. She’s leaving us for the sandy shores of Hawaii next week (and yes, she came to this decision before the forty days and nights of winter that’s snowed down upon us). She has been an active member for years, and she will be sorely missed. If you haven’t met her, Janel is one of the few people who combine fairy dust, a cat’s sense of mischief, sunshine, sharp wit, and the no-nonsense attitude of the former Marine that she is.


Please come out on Sunday to watch some good games, and to hang out with Janel and Co : ) If you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment. when you RSVP 

Personal note from Devorah – I wrote the above write-up (I didn’t want you to think she wrote it about herself!

 

I'll be your host for this event, number in RSVP
item.name: Watch Soccer at Anna Liffeys/Goodbye to Janel
